articles.author: TN Sports Desk, Sajal Patra
articles.title: Not Shubman Gill Or Tilak Varma! Irfan Pathan Names Surprise Pick For Next Big Superstar Of World Cricket - Times Now
articles.description: Former India pacer, Irfan Pathan reckons that star Mumbai Indians (MI) allrounder Cameron Green is the next big thing in world cricket and the Australian is raising his game every passing day at every given opportunity.
articles.content: Heat Wave Conditions To Prevail In UP, Odisha; Heavy Rainfall Projected In Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand: IMD
